verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* David \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Nob \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Ahimelech \w the|strong="H6965"\w* priest: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Ahimelech \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* meet David trembling, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H3083"\w*, Why art \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* alone, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w no|strong="H6965"\w* man \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* Ahimelech \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w The|strong="H1732"\w* king \w hath|strong="H3548"\w* commanded me \w a|strong="H3068"\w* business, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w hath|strong="H3548"\w* said \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* me, Let no man know \w anything|strong="H7122"\w* \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* business whereabout \w I|strong="H7122"\w* send thee, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w what|strong="H1732"\w* \w I|strong="H7122"\w* \w have|strong="H3548"\w* commanded thee: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w I|strong="H7122"\w* \w have|strong="H3548"\w* appointed \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w young|strong="H1732"\w* men \w to|strong="H1732"\w* such \w and|strong="H3548"\w* such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place.

\w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1732"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* under \w thy|strong="H3045"\w* hand? \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* five loaves \w of|strong="H4428"\w* bread \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hand, \w or|strong="H4428"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H1697"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* present.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* priest answered \w David|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* said, \w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* common \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w but|strong="H6258"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* holy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; \w if|strong="H3426"\w* only \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w young|strong="H4672"\w* men \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* women.

\w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, \w Of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* truth women \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w been|strong="H3426"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w about|strong="H1732"\w* \w these|strong="H1732"\w* three days; \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3548"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w common|strong="H2455"\w* journey; \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H3027"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H6030"\w* to-day \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* vessels \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*?

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w gave|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add bread\add*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H6113"\w* bread \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* showbread, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H8032"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* hot bread \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* certain \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saul \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, detained \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* name \w was|strong="H3068"\w* Doeg \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Edomite, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* chiefest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* herdsmen \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w belonged|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Saul.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Ahimelech, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w not|strong="H6113"\w* \w here|strong="H8033"\w* \w under|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* hand spear \w or|strong="H3117"\w* sword? \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* neither \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w nor|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* weapons \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w*â€™s business \w required|strong="H3117"\w* haste.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* priest \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Goliath \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistine, \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* slewest \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* vale \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Elah, \w behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* wrapped \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cloth behind \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ephod: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* \w wilt|strong="H3426"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H6311"\w* save \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*; \w give|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* arose, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* fled \w that|strong="H3588"\w* day \w for|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w Saul|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Achish \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king \w of|strong="H6010"\w* Gath.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achish said \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*? \w did|strong="H1732"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* sing \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w another|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* dances, saying, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* slain \w his|strong="H1732"\w* thousands, \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w ten|strong="H1732"\w* thousands?

\w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w laid|strong="H1732"\w* \w up|strong="H6030"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* words \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* sore afraid \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achish \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Gath.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* changed \w his|strong="H7760"\w* behavior \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* feigned \w himself|strong="H3824"\w* mad \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* hands, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* scrabbled \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* doors \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gate, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* spittle fall \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* beard.

\w Then|strong="H3381"\w* said Achish \w unto|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* servants, Lo, ye \w see|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H8179"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w mad|strong="H1984"\w*; wherefore \w then|strong="H3381"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* ye \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Do|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* lack \w madmen|strong="H7696"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w ye|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w brought|strong="H5650"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \w fellow|strong="H7696"\w* \w to|strong="H5650"\w* play \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w madman|strong="H7696"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* presence? \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \w fellow|strong="H7696"\w* come \w into|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* house?
